originalText.text: Dr Jaliman is always available for consultations and takes her time when she’s with patients. Her staff is impeccably polite. As far as any type of cosmetic procedures- she never over sells or over does! I trust her implicitly. She has also been aware of skin cancers and saved my life about 25 years ago by removing an early stage melanoma. Love her!

originalText.text: Superb Dermatologist for skin care, beauty & cancer prevention.  Dr. Debra Jaliman has been our family’s dermatologist for over a decade. Her medical expertise covers skin cancer checks, treatments & prevention. Dr. Jaliman’s beauty expertise extensively covers all current treatments. She and her medical assistant, Gosha, are So Kind & So Smart.  Body checks & beauty treatments always done with such care and complete explanation. Dr. Jaliman’s affiliation with Mt Sinai and connections with Sloan Kettering have proven so helpful to us. Visits are a joy & I go for skin checks & Clear & Brilliant often.  Our family’s utmost recommendation.

originalText.text: My entire family, including my children, husband and sisters, has gone to Dr. Jaliman for over two decades. She is the most careful, smart, attentive dermatologist. She has kept all of our skin so healthy. She does our full body checks annually and takes the best care of us throughout the year. She is on the forefront of all new discoveries and medical procedures and is an expert on protecting and maintaining beautiful, healthy skin. In addition, she is an expert on maintaining healthy hair and scalp, as well as hair growth in both men and women. I give Dr. Jaliman my strongest recommendation.

originalText.text: Dr. Debra Jaliman has been my dermatologist for over 20 years for both medical issues and cosmetic treatments.  She is medically very astute and up to date while also providing state-of-the-art cosmetic offerings.  Her office is very pleasant and well-run.  I have often recommended her to friends over the years.  She is a very understanding doctor, which seems rare these days.

originalText.text: I’ve been seeing Dr. Jaliman for close to a decade. I have no intentions on going anywhere else. The front desk is pleasant every time you come (Even calling you by your name before you checkin) And there’s never any issues getting last-minute appointments. Not only is Dr. Jaliman very knowledgeable, she’s very personable, and it feels like home every time I go. I would certainly recommend her to anyone that’s looking for a good dermatologist.
